name: Pinball on Ketamine
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A nostalgia trip back in time but with a twist:
Every time you lose a ball, you slowly get more of them, but more balls also gives you more score...

You have a choice: either play old school or embrace the chaos and crank those score numbers to an all new high!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

jo_kil - Dev

Cinnazeyy - Dev

Waggiswagen - Music

all assets (code, 3d models, music etc.) other than sound fx and 2 textures were made by ourselves

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
